title: Brazil : most valuable soccer players at the 2018 FIFA World Cup
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market value in million euros for 10 number of Months.
Month Neymar has the highest Market value in million euros and Ederson has the lowest Market value in million euros.
The highest Month Neymar has 130.0 more Market value in million euros than the lowest Month Ederson.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Market value in million euros in the y axis.
Month Neymar has the highest Market value in million euros and Ederson has the lowest Market value in million euros.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market value in million euros for 10 number of Months.
Month Neymar has the highest Market value in million euros and Ederson has the lowest Market value in million euros.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market value in million euros for 10 number of Months.
Month Neymar has the highest Market value in million euros and Ederson has the lowest Market value in million euros.
Second maximum Market value in million euros is found at Month Philippe Coutinho.
The highest Month Neymar has 130.0 more Market value in million euros than the lowest Month Ederson.
The Month Neymar has the highest Market value in million euros, followed by Philippe Coutinho, and Gabriel Jesus. Down to the Month Ederson which is the lowest.
Overall Market value in million euros has lowered over the Months.
Month Casemiro, Marcelo, and Alisson share the same value 60.0.
Considered together, the average Market value in million euros in all 10 Months is roughly 78.0.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 780.0.
